name: Idle Champions: Casual Karlach Skin & Feat Pack
summary: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Karlach (if you don't already own them) Casual Karlach Skin An Epic Feat for Karlach 7 Gold Karlach Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts
